message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and our current discussion.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is significantly lower than what I'm willing to accept.  To be fair, I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This price reflects the value of the product and allows for a reasonable profit for me. Let's see if we can find a common ground.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on our previous discussions and considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $11,000. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
